name: SleepingSounds
0:
”Alexa, open sleeping sounds”
”Alexa, launch sleeping sounds”
”Alexa, start sleeping sounds”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: sleeping sounds
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Sleeping Sounds is the ultimate Alexa skill designed to create a peaceful and soothing ambiance. Whether you're looking to unwind, meditate, or simply escape into tranquility, this skill provides an array of calming soundscapes tailored to your relaxation needs.

⭐PREMIUM FEATURES ⭐

• Diverse Sound Library: Explore serene soundscapes like Gentle Ocean Waves, Rustling Forest Leaves, Soft Rain Showers, and more.
• Customizable Experience: Adjust playback duration or request your favorite relaxation sounds to be included in future updates.
• Premium Quality Audio: High-definition recordings ensure every note and sound is perfectly calming.
• Regularly Updated Content: Fresh and unique sounds added regularly to keep your experience revitalized.
• Sleeping Sounds is your perfect companion for unwinding after a busy day, enhancing your meditation practice, or setting the mood for restful sleep.

💫 Let the tranquil melodies of Sleeping Sounds guide you to peace and rejuvenation. Happy relaxing! 💫
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
